description: A black and white cat is lying on a bed in a living room, occasionally shifting position and gazing around. The camera gradually zooms in on the cat's face, capturing its attentive gaze and relaxed posture.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: A drawer is typically part of a cabinet, not lying next to it; it doesn't make sense functionally for a drawer to be lying next to a cabinet.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: physically_impossible
